name: Michele Sarzana
subtitle: Head of Brand, Communication & eCommerce @ Fastweb | Executive MBA
about: With over 10 years of experience in the digital marketing and media industry, I lead the Brand Marketing, Communication & eCommerce team at Fastweb, one of the largest telecom operators in Italy. My mission is to create and execute innovative and impactful brand and communication strategies, from TVC to social media, that drive customer acquisition, retention, and loyalty. I also oversee the eCommerce team, focused on optimizing digital sales and cross-selling opportunities, as well as the digital properties evolution and strategy. I combine creativity and branding with data analytics and insights, leveraging programmatic advertising, social channels, search and performance marketing, and DMP analytics. I also ensure the development and implementation of omnichannel and cross-channel digital initiatives, such as ChatBOT Marvin on Facebook, to enhance customer experience and satisfaction. I am passionate about technology, analysis, and risk, and I believe that great ideas need to be scary. I obtained an Executive MBA at SDA Bocconi, one of the top business schools in Europe, to further develop my leadership and management skills.
